mapper.sql: id, business_id, title, main_image, banner, activity_start_time, activity_end_time, enroll_start_time, enroll_end_time, jm_region_id, address, phone, state, deleted, sys_user_id, create_time
mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, jr.region_name, a.main_image, a.activity_start_time as date from tb_activity a left join const_jm_region jr on jr.id = a.jm_region_id right join tb_business b on b.id = a.business_id where b.id = #{businessId} and a.state = 1 and a.deleted = 0 order by a.create_time desc

select a.id, a.title, jr.region_name, a.main_image, a.activity_start_time as date from tb_activity a left join const_jm_region jr on jr.id = a.jm_region_id where 1 = 1 and a.state = 1 and a.deleted = 0
and jr.id = #{jmRegionId}
and a.enroll_start_time <= now() and a.enroll_end_time > now()
and a.enroll_start_time > now()
and a.enroll_end_time < now()
order by a.create_time desc

select a.id, a.title, jr.region_name, a.main_image, a.activity_start_time as date from tb_activity a left join const_jm_region jr on jr.id = a.jm_region_id right join tb_index_activity ia on ia.activity_id = a.id where 1 = 1 and a.state = 1 and a.deleted = 0 order by ia.seq

select a.id, a.title, jr.region_name, a.main_image, a.activity_start_time as date from tb_activity a left join const_jm_region jr on jr.id = a.jm_region_id right join tb_user_collect_activity ia on ia.activity_id = a.id where 1 = 1 and ia.user_id = #{userId} and a.state = 1 and a.deleted = 0 order by ia.create_time desc
